data.title: Holiday rentals in Riola: book villas & apartments
data.meta_description: Rent with confidence from verified homeowners. Choose from 0 holiday apartments, villas and country homes in Riola.
data.text:
7 pers.3 bedrooms265 m²1.5 km to the coast

Outdoor poolHot tubWiFiTVSatellite TVGardenBed linenFenced propertyTowels

The holiday home 'Villa in Cullera Valencia' is located in Cullera and impresses guests with its view of the mountain. This 3-storey property consists of a living room, a kitchen with dishwasher, 3 bedrooms, and 2 bathrooms and can therefore accommodate 6 people. Additional amenities include high-speed Wi-Fi (suitable for video calls), a fan, a washing machine as well as satellite TV. A baby cot and a high chair are also available. The villa boasts a private outdoor area with a fenced pool, a garden, an open terrace, a covered terrace, a balcony, a barbecue, a playground, and an outdoor shower. Hop in the pool for an afternoon of family fun while enjoying relaxing mountain views! Free parking is available on the street. Pets are not allowed. Air conditioning is not available. Groups of guests under 25 years of age are not allowed as the property. The house is focused on families and couples. This property has recycling rules, more information is provided on-site....

FREE cancellation

5 pers.3 bedrooms120 m²6.3 km to the coast

TerraceTV

Spend a wonderful holiday in this modern holiday apartment. With its location, the apartment is the ideal place for a versatile holiday. Look forward to bright rooms and cosy, modern furnishings. Relax here in a pleasant setting, enjoy meals together and cosy evenings on the comfortable sofa. Step out onto the terrace in the morning and let your gaze wander over the village, a view that makes you want to set off and get to know the area better. Grab your bath towel and make your way to the sea, which you can easily reach by car from this holiday apartment. Visit impressive buildings such as the church of San Pedro Apostol and the town hall in the centre of Sueca. Just a short drive from Sueca is the Albufera Natural Park, an impressive wetland area known for its rich wildlife and picturesque sunsets. Here you can take a boat trip on the lake or explore the landscape on the hiking and cycling trails....

7 pers.3 bedrooms172 m²9.2 km to the coast

Outdoor poolWiFiParking on siteAir conditioningTVGardenBed linenFenced propertyTowels

The holiday apartment "En Monsalva" is located on the top floor of a beautiful villa situated in Corbera and boasts a beautiful view of the mountain. This property consists of a living room, a fully-equipped kitchen with dishwasher, 3 bedrooms, and 3 bathrooms as well as 3 additional toilets and can therefore accommodate 7 people. Additional amenities include high-speed Wi-Fi (suitable for video calls) with a dedicated workspace for home office, a TV, air conditioning, a washing machine as well as a dryer. A high chair and 2 baby cots are also available. This property offers a private outdoor area with a pool, a garden, an open terrace that features fantastic mountain views, a balcony, and an outdoor shower. It also provides access to a shared outdoor area with a barbecue. A parking space is available on the property. Pets, smoking, and celebrating events are not allowed. The hosts use the groundfloor apartment 10 days per month. The property offers homemade/homegrown produce. The property has motorbike and bicycle storage. This property has guidelines to help guests with the correct separation of waste. More information is provided on site. This property has light and water-saving features....

FREE cancellation

6 pers.3 bedrooms270 m²1.6 km to the coast

Outdoor poolWiFiParking on siteAir conditioningTVGardenBed linenFenced propertyTowels

Villa Casablanca is located on a hillside on it’s own plot raised and surrounded among pine trees overlooking the Albufera National Park and only minutes away from the unspoiled sand dune "El Dosel" beach popular with wind/kite surfers known as one of the last untouched beauties with crystal clear waters along the Spanish coastline. Due to it’s position the property is raised above the street level with quite a few steps leading up to the entrance as can be appreciated on the photos. There is a street parking in front of the Villa. The Villa centres on a large open plan double height living area wrapped on two sides by six meters of glass front that lets the natural light into the heart of the house creating a seamless outdoor/indoor environment between the living room and the large wood-decked terrace centred around the pool. An adjoining indoor dining area and open plan kitchen/breakfast area tempts one never to leave the poolside, day or night. The surrounding pine trees lend the house a sense of privacy, seclusion and exclusivity. The house can comfortably sleep six with accommodation split over the air-conditioned master bedroom with ensuite shower/bathroom and 2 twin bedrooms that share a bathroom. All bedrooms have fitted wardrobes and A/C except the bedroom with two single beds which is equipped with an air-fan. There is a laundry room with washing machine,ironing table...

7 pers.4 bedrooms150 m²1.3 km to the coast

WiFiAir conditioningTVGardenBed linenTowels

The holiday home Casa Los Geranios is located in Cullera and impresses guests with its view of the mountain. This 150 m² property consists of a living room, a fully-equipped kitchen with dishwasher, 4 bedrooms, and 2 bathrooms and can therefore accommodate 7 people. Additional amenities include Wi-Fi, air conditioning, a fan, a washing machine as well as a TV. The holiday home boasts a private outdoor area with a whirlpool, a garden, 2 open terraces, and 2 balconies. A BBQ is available upon request and for a weekly fee. Enjoy relaxing mountain views while preparing a healthy meal for your loved ones! Nearby recommendations include Cullera Castle, the Sanctuary of Our Lady of the Incarnation, the beaches of Cullera, and the lighthouse of Albufera de Valencia. Pets are not allowed. Parties, events, and celebrations are forbidden. Smoking is only allowed outside the property. Traditional Valencian wood-fired paellas are available (reservation required in advance). This property has recycling rules, more information is provided on-site. - Energy Payment 5,00 € per night...

FREE cancellation

4 pers.2 bedrooms279 m²9.7 km to the coast

WiFiAir conditioningBed linenTowels

Located in Corbera, this 2-bedroom, 2.5-bathroom vacation home lets you experience it all. Fans of nature and the outdoors will love being 10 minutes by car from Albufera Natural Park and 18 minutes from Playa de San Antonio. You'll easily make the 13-minute drive to Aquopolis Cullera or the 17-minute drive to Cullera Lighthouse. While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a jetted bathtub and WiFi, as well as a bidet and air conditioning. Other amenities include towels, an ironing board, soap, and toilet paper....

FREE cancellation
